title: Doctors and coronavirus: ‘How can we not be afraid?’
description: Health workers are paying a heavy cost in the coronavirus pandemic - here are some of their stories.
content:
Image copyrightEPA
The coronavirus pandemic is taking a heavy toll on the healthcare workers around the world battling to contain it.
